description:
Pro-level, wide pedals for downhill and all-mountain riding. They're lightweight, with a concave platform and wide q-factor designed for downhill racing. Shred secure in the knowledge that your feet can find the pedals at the moment they need to.

  • Q-factor is 57mm
  • Aluminum platform
  • Wings are are cast stainless steel
  • Spring is 300-series stainless steel
  • Inner and outer bearings are Igus LL-glide and Enduro cartridge respectively
  • Cleats are premium brass with shims included
  • Release angle is 15 to 20 degrees
  • 8 adjustable pins per side for traction
  • Inner needle bearing for smooth rotation
name: Crankbrothers Mallet DH Pedals
